successes.title: All Quiet on the Martian Front, Miniature Tanks vs Tripods
successes.description: Itâ€™s Tanks vs. Tripods, Big Guns vs. Heat Rays in a new 15mm Miniature Game of all out Interplanetary War in 1910.

Pledges.description: Private 1st Class! A Public Thank You - your name listed on our website as a contributor!
Captain!  A Copy of the complete All Quiet on the Martian Front Hardback Rulebook as well as a DIGITAL COPY!
Retail Value $45

Invasion! Starter Set includes Three (3) Plastic Assault Tripods, Six (6) MKII Baldwin Tanks, Two (2) Units of Dough Boys (30 figures), One (1) Unit of HMG Crews (9 figures), One (1) Unit of Rough Riders (6 Harleys), Applicable plastic figure bases, Starter Rulebook, Cardboard Templates and Two (2) D10 dice.
Retail Value $160, MSRP $100

BRITISH INVASION!  One (1) Unit of Vickers (9 figs + 3 Guns), Two (2) Units of British Infantry (20 figs), Three (3) Imperial Tanks, Three (3) Mono Tanks, One (1) Defiant Armoured Car, Three (3) Martian Assault Tripods, Applicable plastic figure bases, Starter Rulebook, Cardboard Templates, Two (2) D10 dice and All Applicable Stretch Goals Reached. Retail Value $168 MSRP $100

Deluxe Invasion! Three (3) Plastic Assault Tripods, Three (3) Martian Drones, Two (2) Units of Martian Slaves (Cadaver/Zombie) (30 figures), One (1) Martian Slave Driver, Six (6) MKII Baldwin Tanks, Three (3) MKIII Baldwin Tanks, One (1) Anti-Tripod Gun (with 6 Crew), Applicable plastic figure bases, Starter Rulebook, Upgraded to Plastic Templates, Upgraded to Six (6) Green D10 dice, Upgraded to Six (6) Red D10 dice and All Applicable Stretch Goals Reached. Retail Value $230

Battle of Memphis! Three (3) Plastic Assault Tripods, Three (3) Martian Drones, Two (2) Units of Martian Slaves (Cadaver/Zombie) (30 figures), One (1) Martian Slave Driver, Six (6) MKII Baldwin Tanks, Three (3) MKIII Baldwin Tanks, One (1) Anti-Tripod Gun (with 6 Crew), Applicable plastic figure bases, Full Hard Cover Rulebook, Upgraded to Plastic Templates, Upgraded to Six (6) Green D10 dice, Upgraded to Six (6) Red D10 dice and All Applicable Stretch Goals Reached. Retail Value $255
